title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using valid email and password data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid email address and a compliant password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that the user is registered and redirected to the dashboard or welcome page.

title: User Registration with Existing Email
description: Verify that registration fails when the email is already registered.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter an email address that is already registered.
Submit the registration form.
Check that an appropriate error message is displayed and registration is blocked.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to the user dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect email or password and an error message is shown.

steps.description: Go to the login page.
Input invalid email or password.
Attempt to sign in.
Confirm that login is rejected with a relevant error message.

title: Password Reset - Request Email
description: Verify that users can request a password reset email with a valid registered address.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Enter a registered email address.
Submit the password reset request.
Check that a password reset email notification is sent.

title: Password Reset - Invalid Email
description: Verify that the system handles password reset requests for unregistered emails gracefully.

steps.description: Go to the password reset page.
Input an unregistered email address.
Submit the password reset request.
Verify that the system displays a message without revealing non-existence of the email.

title: AI Document Analysis - Single Document Upload and Analysis
description: Verify that a user can upload a supported legal document and receive a detailed AI-powered analysis based on selected AI provider and analysis type.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the document upload/analysis page.
Upload a single valid legal document file (PDF, DOC, or DOCX).
Select an AI provider from the available options (OpenAI GPT-5, Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4, Google Gemini 2.5 Pro).
Select document type for analysis (general, contract, judicial, compliance).
Submit the document for analysis.
Verify that real-time analysis results appear with detailed feedback, consistent with the chosen AI provider and document type.

title: AI Document Analysis - Unsupported File Format Upload
description: Verify that the system rejects unsupported file formats with appropriate error messaging.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a file with an unsupported format (e.g., .txt, .exe).
Confirm that the upload is rejected and user is shown an error explaining allowed file formats.

title: Credit System - Initial Free Credit Allocation
description: Verify that new users receive an initial free credit allowance upon registration for document analyses.

steps.description: Register a new user and log in.
Confirm the userâ€™s credit balance reflects the initial free credit allocation.

title: Credit System - Credit Consumption on Analysis
description: Verify that credits are correctly deducted after a document analysis based on dynamic cost calculation.

steps.description: Perform a document analysis using a selected AI provider.
Check that the credit balance is decreased accurately reflecting the cost of the analysis.

title: Credit System - Billing and Transaction History Accuracy
description: Verify that the billing system accurately records transactions and displays correct history and invoices for the user.

steps.description: Make a credit purchase using Stripe with a valid payment method.
View the billing history page.
Verify the transaction is logged correctly with details matching the purchase, and credit balance updates accordingly.

title: Batch Document Upload and Analysis with Progress Tracking
description: Verify that users can upload multiple documents in batch, monitor progress, and receive a comprehensive report after processing.

steps.description: Navigate to batch upload interface.
Upload multiple supported document files simultaneously.
Verify that progress of each document analysis is visible in real-time.
Check that a detailed batch report is generated and accessible upon completion.

title: Admin Dashboard - User Management Functionality
description: Verify that admins can view, search, filter, and manage user accounts effectively within the dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as an admin and navigate to the dashboard.
Access the user management section.
Perform operations such as searching, filtering, and updating user roles or statuses.
Verify that all user management actions produce expected results without errors.

title: Admin Dashboard - AI Provider Configuration
description: Verify admins can add, edit, or disable AI providers and changes affect the user selection options.

steps.description: Access AI provider configuration in admin dashboard.
Add a new AI provider or modify existing provider settings.
Verify the updated AI providers are reflected correctly when users initiate analyses.

title: Support System - Ticket Creation and Real-Time Chat
description: Verify users can create support tickets, receive responses, and chat with support agents in real-time.

steps.description: Create a new support ticket through the user interface.
Verify ticket is created and visible in support system.
Initiate real-time chat with support agent.
Confirm message delivery and timely responses in chat.

title: File Upload Validation - Corrupted or Large File
description: Verify that corrupted or files exceeding the size limit are rejected with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a corrupted legal document file.
Confirm upload fails with clear error message describing file corruption.
Attempt to upload a valid legal document exceeding size limit.
Confirm upload is rejected with size limit error.

title: Email Notification - User Action Confirmations
description: Verify that email notifications are sent for key user actions such as registration, password reset requests, credit purchase, and analysis completion.

steps.description: Perform user registration.
Verify registration confirmation email is received.
Request a password reset email.
Verify password reset email is sent.
Purchase credits.
Verify billing and purchase confirmation email is sent.
Complete a document analysis.
Verify analysis completion notification email is sent.

title: Data Encryption and Security - In Transit and At Rest
description: Validate that user data, documents, and credentials are encrypted in storage and during network transmission as per security standards.

steps.description: Inspect network data flow to confirm encrypted transmission (HTTPS, encrypted APIs).
Access stored data in database and confirm encryption at rest.
Verify no sensitive information is stored or transmitted in plaintext.

title: User Role Management - Role-Based Access Control Verification
description: Verify that different user roles (standard user, admin) have proper access restrictions and permissions to features and data.

steps.description: Log in as a standard user.
Verify absence of admin dashboard access and restricted admin-only features.
Log in as an admin.
Verify full access to all administrative features and user management.

title: Analysis Result Accuracy Comparison Across AI Providers
description: Verify that document analysis results correspond accurately and distinctly to each selected AI provider for given same document and analysis type.

steps.description: Upload a legal document for analysis.
Select AI provider OpenAI GPT-5 and perform analysis.
Record analysis output.
Repeat the same with Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4 and Google Gemini 2.5 Pro.
Compare outputs and verify unique provider-specific feedback while maintaining correct domain relevance.
